name: DeerHunterX
description: Shoot a tone of deer, earn points, buy better guns to kill deer faster.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) Storage: 4 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 - (64 Bit) Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150) Memory: 6 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) Storage: 6 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
